channel.title: lifestyle on Pascals Blog
channel.description: Recent content in lifestyle on Pascals Blog

item.title: The way I see it, every life is a pile of good things
item.description: Still, she’s got a lot of spirit. I don’t know, what do you think? Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid. I can’t get involved! I’ve got work to do! It’s not that I like the Empire, I hate it, but there’s nothing I can do about it right now. It’s such a long way from here. I care. So, what do you think of her, Han?

item.title: The Force is strong with this one. I have you now
item.description: Still, she’s got a lot of spirit. I don’t know, what do you think? Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid. I can’t get involved! I’ve got work to do! It’s not that I like the Empire, I hate it, but there’s nothing I can do about it right now. It’s such a long way from here. Behind the scenes I suggest you try it again, Luke.
